body.p: The definition of financial risk in IFRS 17 is unchanged from that in IFRS 4. To provide clarity on the treatment of assumptions about inflation when applying IFRS 17, the Board decided to specify that for the purposes of IFRS 17:

li.p: assumptions about inflation based on an index of prices or rates or on prices of assets with inflation-linked returns are financial assumptions; and
assumptions about inflation based on an entity’s expectation of specific price changes are non-financial assumptions.
